website_summaries.verdict: The machine you build using this kit is best for amateur laser engraving and low-light positioning. It may be a challenge to assemble, however.
pros: 500 MW DIY desktop blue laser engraving machine
Can be used with wood, plastic, paper, bamboo, bone, leather, plastic phone, shells, sponge paper, and other media
cons: Manufacturer states this is not an industrial-grade machine
Cannot be used to engrave metal

customer_reviews.title: Amazing will upgrade soon Great product thank you Bachin
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my lazer engraver. I purchased the 2500 it came packaged extremely well took some time to put it together but was well worth it. It has taken so reading, research, and alot of trial and error but I have finally figured out the ins and outs. I have burned wood in both design and photograph, learned to cut wood and also have been able to cut paper and felt as well as sticker foam as long as it is a larger item due to the foam melting with smaller details. I am still experimenting and fine tuning my settings for what I want it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Scanlon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners !!!
customer_reviews.text: Packaged securely and great , a bit of a headache to assemble , Had a few issues getting the timing blet's to be tight enough . Assemble video is not playable so I assemble by looking at the final product took 12 hrs . Operation : five stars all the way , software easy to use for beginners , machine and laser perform perfect !!!! Looking to upgrade the laser to a 7000mw !!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: jankie

customer_reviews.title: Very upset with this item.
customer_reviews.text: I usually do not write reviews but I have ordered thousands or products from Amazon and not blaming Amazon at all! However this is my first negative posting out of thousands of orders. This product came in, had no assembly instruction, I had to look online. Now after about 6 hours of burning wood, it quit. I am not satisfied at all with this item. I want to emphasize again that this is my first Negitive review after several thousands of orders and hold Amazon at no fault.
customer_reviews.author: michael H.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I really really wanted this to work correctly but it just didn’t. I used my own picture to engrave, they advertised you could, and it didn't engrave the picture correctly. The engraving was distorted. I thought I’d try one of the pictures in their library and again it was distorted. The laser even just stopped working in the middle of an engraving. Very very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua E.

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A HUGE WASTE OF TIME!!
customer_reviews.text: I AM SO ANNOYED! This thing was a BEAST to put together and now it won't even do the job. I tried two simple tasks and it just burns a line. They do not reply for support so I am returning it. I'm SO glad I have that option because for $200 I got a whole lot of nothing.
customer_reviews.author: C Dur

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this item
customer_reviews.text: My son used his birthday money to invest in this as a hobby to earn a little extra money. We have been using it less than a week and I'm so disappointed, so is he. WHEN it will work right, 1 out of 3 attempts, it looks nice. BUT the arms keep getting stuck and ruining his designs. I would not recommend this product at this time. Heartbroken for him as he watches a design get a little over half done before it's ruined because the arm is stuck and the laser keeps moving 😔
customer_reviews.author: Amy R

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: It's not figuring out the laser engraver, it's the software! But in the end, it doesnt work.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystal

customer_reviews.title: Great engraver for the money
customer_reviews.text: Is working great, great engraver for the money, will take some time to put it together, but totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Marius L. Radulescu

customer_reviews.title: Great Laser Engraver
customer_reviews.text: This laser engraver does a great job. Assembly isn’t bad, just watch the video and it’s pretty straight forward. It’s very easy to use and the customer service is phenomenal.
customer_reviews.author: Bogunn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to assemble, just follow the instructions. Mine does not sit flat, I have not attempted to loosen everything and try again. Having some difficulties predicting where the laser will start on an item, may be user error.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not move
customer_reviews.text: I followed the youtube video to a T. The machine does not move while engraving or cutting nor does it even cut thru anything. Just burns it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: amber singleton

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy, takes forever and not easy to use. Waste of my money
customer_reviews.author: rick dewoody

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great beginner laser. It's does great detail in the nc mode and is really easy to use and set up. I already recommended it to a friend and he got one too. Customer service is super helpful too.
customer_reviews.author: Urana Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Its worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This laser is fast! I own the smaller unit that takes forever and upgraded to tbis model and I'm very happy! Takes a while to put it together but lots of fun after! Now I'm looking at bigger lasers!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Christopher

customer_reviews.title: She's a Beaut Clark!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was kind of a pain to put together but the results made it all worth it! and its easy to use!!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Only buy if you like to be disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This product came in pieces with no assembly instructions. After finding the assembly instruction video online and hours of putting it together, we were excited to test it. Needless to say we were disappointed with it's performance. Returned it the same week we got it. We spent a little more and got a Cricket.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Tran

customer_reviews.title: GREAT CUSTOMER SERVICE !!!!
customer_reviews.text: Had problems with the laser head , contacted the for advice and repairs. Very quick to fix the issue , very good communications . Product is up and working again. Thank You !! for the great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Barry R Brandriff

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with MAC!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this engraver thinking that I could just install the software and begin engraving. After about 2hrs of assembling the machine I find out that it does not work on MacOS! Nowhere in the product description mentions this. What a damn waste of energy and money
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: More than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: More for my money than I expected. Having a blast using it.
customer_reviews.author: Jody Porter

customer_reviews.title: Like my engraver
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, shipping updates while in transit. Easy to assemble and use.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Best engraver for detailed photo printing too.
customer_reviews.text: its connected to the computer as the program operates and gives you click to jog and he laser preview button is awsome. This is as good as it gets for quality! You could even mount it to a wall if you wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Coda

customer_reviews.title: Didn't come with any instructions on how to put together!
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice... but very difficult to put together! I've only found one video of how to put this together... but it wasn't in english...
customer_reviews.author: Arieemayy

customer_reviews.title: Can't find any support
customer_reviews.text: No where to find help if you need to talk to someone, Good luck!!! Not going to well. My programming screen is cut off on the right side so I can't see all the menus. I'v tried everything to fix this.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great hobby!
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it's simple to use an operate. Only down side is I wished it came with some running times an options. Like running 2 hours rest 15. But over all great machine I use it over and over!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: laser printer
customer_reviews.text: this is amazing ive been creating all types of things pics to come !
customer_reviews.author: Gregory L. Houston

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 uses in a week!
customer_reviews.text: I used this twice and it broke laser stop turning on
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: CNC Engraver Kits
customer_reviews.text: Love it so far. Good thing there was an assembly video. Went together easy with video instructions. Have used it daily. Works great for outline pictures, and wording.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Save money and buy a wood burner
customer_reviews.text: This was an absolute waste of time. Thankfully Amazon was able to do a return and refund. It did nothing but burn wood. I wish I had listened to the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Mary taylor

customer_reviews.title: Handy for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: Not that easy to ensamble but not rocket science as well, anybody with a little experience on putting things together can figure out, advice: watch the whole video first (look on YouTube). I’m totally new at this kind of product and after some trial and error I figure out how things work, more time on burning means better results, the kind of wood you decide to use is important and may vary the final product, go for clearer wood and you can stain after to better visual effects. The laser potency is relevant for burning/cutting, from 2500 and up you can cut, don’t expect that on models 300 or 500mV. Play with it is fun!
customer_reviews.author: Angel Estrada

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great entry level engraver @ 2500 Mw power output however if I were to buy again I would opt for the 5500 Mw output version for cutting. Make sure you wear the enclosed safety glasses when operating!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Marsillo

customer_reviews.title: works extremely well
customer_reviews.text: Setting up with a little pain but well worth it in the end. also takes a little bit of tinkering but as you can see the end results are phenomenal. strongly recommend building a stand around it so you don't blind yourself or anybody else. I'll keep you updated on more things I create or more problems I find.
customer_reviews.author: danny schamber

customer_reviews.title: Good product when it works
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 3 days ago and the controller board went out, now half to send it back. Otherwise the lazer engraver is a really nice machine to use and very easy when it works. And the other problem is making purchases online and having the hassle of returning the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: DIY CNC Engraver Kits Wood Carving Engraving Cutting Machine Desktop Printer Logo Picture Marking, 40x50cm,2 Axis (500MW)
product_meta.description:
Size:500MW
Applicable system(s):XP/win7/win8/win10 ，Mac is not compatible 
Assemble guide video on http://www.bachinmaker.com/wikien/doku.php?id=bachin_d8-4050p 
Notice: 500mw power only can engrave , can not cut , 2500mw and 5500mw can engrave and cut . 
if you only engrave, you choose 500MW , 
if you want to engrave and cut , you choose 2500MW or 5500mw, 
The package include the Install video with flash memory disk, with detailed user manual and free software,buyers don‘t need to worry about machine Assembly . 
Applicable Product and Non Applicable Scale: 
This Wood engraving machine can not carve the following materials: 
Metal (regardless of thickness), stone, ceramic, jade jewelry, reflective material, colorless transparent material, soft material (7w and 10w can engrave on metal) 
This Wood engraving machine can carve the following materials: 
Wood, paper, bamboo, horns, a little leather (wallet), plastic phone shell, photosensitive chapter, sponge paper 
Specifications: 
Construction: Body Aluminum + Acrylic 
Voltage:110~240V 
Engraving area: 40x50cm 
power: 500mW 
Carving materials: Wood, paper, bamboo, some cortex (purse), cell phone plastic shell, rubber, photosensitive chapter, sponges 
Weight: 5kg 
Package includes: 
1pcs Wood Engraver DIY Kit Parts 
1pcs Power supply 
1pcs USB cable 
1pcs Safety glasses 
Notice: 
The machine for a full set of spare parts, shall be installed by the buyers. 
We suggest cnc-based buyers to buy, 
this machine is not industrial grade level.
feature_bullets: This 500MW DIY desktop engraving machine is ideal for amateur engraving usage with grayscale printing,low-light positioning and freedom positioning functions.
Can be processed material Wood , paper, bamboo, horns, a little leather (wallet),phone shell , photosensitive chapter, sponge paper
It only need you to connect it to the computer,then you can print any pictures your like with your own creativity.
Specifications: Construction: Body Aluminum + Acrylic Voltage:（12V 5A)110~240V Engraving area: 40x50cm
Assemble guide video on https://youtu.be/GUvAVuY-3rU , Notice: 500mw power only can engrave , can not cut , 2500mw and 5500mw can engrave and cut

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars75 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
